confirm_wishlist_deletion: Are you sure you wish to delete this wishlist ?

fill_confirm_new_password: Please fill the confirm new password field

too_short_new_password: New password should have at least 6 characters

confirm_account_deletion: Are you sure you wish to delete your account ?
confirm_share_leaving: Are you sure you wish to leave this wishlist ?

need_list_to_share: You must have a list to share it
empty_cards: No cards clic on the scan button to add one.

email_text:
You can now subscibe to our app to see the shopping lists shared by your friends following one of these links :
iOS : https://testflight.apple.com/join/3mYKhddp
android : https://appdistribution.firebase.dev/i/c0f0bb4294980686
first_auth_needed: You have to authenticate at least one time with email/password
go_to_settings_desc: No fingerprint available, go to the settings to add one
biometrics_check: Do you want to enable the fingerprint authentication for the nexts authentications ?
tutorial_wishlist_name_text: You can set the wishlist name by clicking on it, writing a name, and then pressing the validation button
tutorial_wishlist_color_text: You can set the wishlist color by clicking on the color picker button, selecting a color, and then pressing the validation button
tutorial_wishlist_category_text: You can set the wishlist category by clicking on the category, and then selecting a category
tutorial_item_creation_text: You can create an item by clicking on this button, once the item is created you can modify it by cliking on it and check it by swipping it to the right or delete it by swipping it to the left
tutorial_scan_card_text: You can scan a card by pressing this button and then scan the barcode using the camera, once a card is scanned you can change the card name by clicking on the name or see the card in a bigger size by clicking on the card
tutorial_add_list_text: You can create a wishlist by clicking on this button, once the wishlist is created you can open it by clicking on it
tutorial_share_list_text: You can share a wishlist by clicking on this button, you will first have to choose a contact or type an email and then choose the wishlist to share
tutorial_share_direct_wishlist_text: Once you have wishlist to share, here you can see a wishlist, by clicking directly on a wishlist you will be able to share it without selecting the wishlist at the end of the process
tutorial_delete_share_text: Once you have shared a wishlist, here you can see with who the wishlist is shared and then you can delete a share by clicking on the trash
tutorial_take_picture_text: You can change your profile picture by clicking on this button and taking a picture
tutorial_use_gallery_text: You can change your profile picture using your gallery by clicking on your profile picture
tutorial_settings_text: You can change the settings of the application by clicking on this button
tutorial_change_password_text: You can change your account password by clicking on this button
tutorial_disconnect_text: You can disconnect yourself by clicking on this button
tutorial_delete_account_text: You can delete your account by clicking on this button, you will have to verify your account before being able to delete the account, once the deletion is done all your informations are deleted
tutorial_item_image_text: Here you can see the image of the item if you take a picture or scan a barcode, if you are modifying an existent item you can click on the image to see the image in a bigger size
tutorial_voice_record_text: By clicking on this button you can record your voice to set the item label
tutorial_barcode_scan_text: By clicking on this button you can scan a barcode with your camera to set the item informations
tutorial_take_item_picture_text: By clicking on this button you can take a picture with your camera to set the item picture
tutorial_label_text: Here you can type the item label
tutorial_quantity_text: Here you can set the item quantity, you can change the value with the +- buttons or type it directly
tutorial_unit_text: By clicking on this menu you can choose the item unit
tutorial_validate_text: Once all the informations are set, you can validate the item to create it and add it to the wishlist
cant_edit_category: You can't edit a default category
